Interface CrudService<D,ID>

Type Parameters:
D - the type of the Data Transfer Object (DTO)
ID - the type of the entity identifier
All Known Implementing Classes:
BlogService, CategoryService, CommentService, IngredientService, ProductService, RatingService, RecipeService, UserService
public interface CrudService<D,ID>
Generic service interface CrudService for basic CRUD operations.

Provides standard methods for creating, reading, updating, and deleting entities or DTOs.

Since:
1.0
Author:
Dmytro Babich

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    D
    create(D dto)
    Creates a new entity from the provided DTO.

    Deletes an entity by its ID.

    findAll()
    Retrieves all entities as DTOs.

    Finds an entity by its ID.
    D
    update(ID id, D dto)
    Updates an existing entity identified by ID using the provided DTO.

  • Method Details

    • findAll

      List<D> findAll()
      Retrieves all entities as DTOs.
      Returns:
      list of all DTOs

    • findById

      D findById(ID id)
      Finds an entity by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the identifier of the entity
      Returns:
      the corresponding DTO, or null if not found

    • create

      D create(D dto)
      Creates a new entity from the provided DTO.
      Parameters:
      dto - the DTO containing data for the new entity
      Returns:
      the created DTO

    • update

      D update(ID id, D dto)
      Updates an existing entity identified by ID using the provided DTO.
      Parameters:
      id - the identifier of the entity to update
      dto - the DTO containing updated data
      Returns:
      the updated DTO

    • deleteById

      void deleteById(ID id)
      Deletes an entity by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the identifier of the entity to delete
